Text:
function RIR_EP05_13()
    -- .転-2【2月第4週】「恋は盲目、ただし嗅覚は鋭く」
    SaveData.Title = "恋は盲目、ただし嗅覚は鋭く"

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav")

    MSG([[ After that, every day was hectic.]])

    MSG([[ During every break, we held strategy meetings including the Uran faction members to decide our future course of action.]])

    MSG([[ The training to be done after going home, to compete against Hermes Senpai, was also scheduled down to the minute.]])

    MSG([[ Even I, who usually makes an effort with beauty, was taken aback by the intensity; it made me imagine the hardships Minato-kun had endured so far.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1220.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Serious (…Minato-kun is a boy, but he’s beaten the princesses many times, right?)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1221.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile, sweat (He’s really an amazing guy. I can’t lose either. I’m going to give it my all and beat Hermes Senpai.)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夕方）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ba")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000)

    MSG([[ As I was walking down the main street lost in thought, a shadow suddenly approached.]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0415.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Normal "Lira-san… no, I’ll call you Lira-chan like old times."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ca")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1222.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Surprised "Hiyu…?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
STOP_BGM(2000)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：繁華街（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ After school, I was visiting the busy shopping district near the station with Hiyu. How many years had it been since we went shopping together, just the two of us?]])

    MSG([[ Without much conversation, we kept walking for about ten minutes.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1223.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "So—what’s up? You want to ask me something, right?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I asked Hiyu while browsing the shelves lined with used books outside a store.]])

    MSG([[ What came back was a question I hadn’t expected at all.]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0416.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Normal "Have you started dating Elder Sister Erika?"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ga")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1224.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Flustered "Pfft!?"]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Seeing my startled reaction to the unexpected question, Hiyu smiled as if she had guessed something.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0417.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Smiling "That’s good. I haven’t seen Lira-chan smile or get embarrassed so naturally in a long time."]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0418.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Smiling "Before you started modeling, you were your natural self again, and I’m really happy about that."]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu smiled at me with a gentle expression, recalling old times.]])

    MSG([[ It felt somehow nostalgic. When we entered middle school, Hiyu was the first to become friends with me.]])

    MSG([[ We used to go to lots of places and do all kinds of things together back then. I sort of understand why Hiyu started snapping at me.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1225.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal "Looking back now, I was pretty reckless before I lost to Erika."]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1226.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "My makeup and fashion just got flashier and flashier, so I guess it’s no wonder Hiyu came to dislike me."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0419.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Sad "Yeah. To be honest, I was worried about you. It felt like you were drifting further and further from the Lira-chan I knew…"]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Hiyu spoke a little awkwardly and gave a crumpled smile.]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0420.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Wry smile "But after the Princess Election with Elder Sister Erika, we started talking again, and I realized you hadn’t changed at all."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0421.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Smiling "Especially these past few days since you decided to enter the Princess Imperial Election instead of Erika, I think you’ve been showing the natural smiles you had back then."]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0422.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Flustered "S-So, uh… I thought maybe you and Elder Sister Erika had finally crossed the line! I just had to ask!"]])

    MSG([[ As her words gained heat and her face flushed, I gently cut her off.]])

    MSG([[ Seriously… Even if our relationship improves, her delusional tendencies will probably never be cured.]])

    MSG([[ Before she gets me wrong in some weird way again, I decided to give a measured confirmation.]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1227.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Calm down! Well… you have a good nose for these things. I can’t say much, but you’re mostly right."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0423.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Excited "Yessss!"]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu gave a guts pose at my words. No, what kind of pose is that?]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0424.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Excited, nosebleed "Ufufu! So Lira-san and Elder Sister Erika really are an intimate pair! I’m confident in my ability to sniff out lies! Mufu!"]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1228.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile, sweat (Erika’s lying too, but is this love blindness? No… knowing her, she probably senses it.)]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1229.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Normal (She’s hiding something. She really loves Hiyu and the academy…)]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I still don’t really understand. But back then and now, she’s someone who makes me feel at ease when she’s next to me.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- //CI：リラとヒユ・継続 137
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI137a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ia")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1230.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wink "Well, Hiyu, you’d better root for me too. As Erika’s most beloved ‘knight,’ I’ll stand at the top of the academy."]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01bb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0425.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Hiyu】Serious, nosebleed "I’d be satisfied if I can push Elder Sister up to be the academy’s top princess. So, I expect you to do your best."]])

    MSG([[ Well, whatever. Because I could laugh together again like this with my first friend from this academy.]])

    MSG([[ I was inwardly thankful to Minato-kun for giving me the chance to mend my relationship with Hiyu.]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_14")
end
